zoopedia_trash.text: Seeing trash is irritating to zoo guests. Maintenance workers sweep up trash that is on the ground and trash cans allows guests to throw out their trash in a suitable location.

zoopedia_trashcan.text: A trashcan allows guests to dispose of their trash and will be emptied by maintenance workers. Guests become irritated if trashcans become full. If a guest cannot find a trashcan, they will pitch their trash on the ground.

zoopedia_themedtrashcan.text: A trashcan allows guests to dispose of their trash and will be emptied by maintenance workers. Guests become irritated if trashcans become full. If a guest cannot find a trashcan, they will pitch their trash on the ground. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby scenery objects feature a similar theme.

zoopedia_recyclebin.text: A guest can dispose of their recyclable garbage in these containers. The zoo will enjoy a small cash return when these recyclables are returned for refund.

zoopedia_donationbox.text: A donation box includes an exhibit sign providing a guest with information about the exhibit they are viewing and allows guests to make a donation to the zoo. A guest who is enjoying an animal exhibit is more likely to make a donation.

zoopedia_lamp.text: Lamps provide additional ambience for zoo guests.

zoopedia_themedlamp.text: Lamps provide additional ambience for zoo guests. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby scenery objects feature a similar theme.

zoopedia_viewingareas.text: A viewing area provides a sheltered location from which the guests can view the animals. Wood, steel or stone can be used to make your zoo visually appealing.

zoopedia_themedviewingareas.text: A viewing area provides a sheltered location from which the guests can view the animals. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby viewing area features a similar theme.

zoopedia_picnictable.text: A picnic table allows guests to sit down to consume food and drink purchased at the zoo. Guests are happier when they don't have to eat standing up.

zoopedia_fountains.text: Guests enjoy the appearance of a fountain, especially when it represents one of their favorite animals.

zoopedia_themedfountains.text: Guests enjoy the appearance of a fountain, especially when it represents one of their favorite animals. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby scenery objects feature a similar theme.

zoopedia_statue.text: Guests enjoy the appearance of a statue, especially when it represents one of their favorite animals.

zoopedia_themedstatue.text: Guests enjoy the appearance of a statue, especially when it represents one of their favorite animals. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby scenery objects feature a similar theme.

zoopedia_bench.text: Guests will become tired as they walk around the zoo. A bench provides a convenient location to take a break. Fatigued guests who can't find a seat will become unhappy.

zoopedia_themedbench.text: Guests will become tired as they walk around the zoo. A bench provides a convenient location to take a break. Fatigued guests who can't find a seat will become unhappy. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby scenery objects feature a similar theme.

zoopedia_arch.text: An arch adds a nice decorative element to paths and zoo areas. Guests enjoy walking under the arch.

zoopedia_themedarch.text: An arch adds a nice decorative element to paths and zoo areas. Guests enjoy walking under the arch. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby scenery objects feature a similar theme.

zoopedia_binoculars.text: Viewing binoculars allow guests to get an even closer view of the animals in an exhibit. When guests get a good view of all the interesting things an animal does, they enjoy the exhibit even more.

zoopedia_soundrock.text: These small rocks are outdoor speakers that blend nicely into the landscaping and create a pleasant ambience for guests. Guests are happy to hear the audio as they walk nearby.

zoopedia_feedingdispenser.text: A feeding dispenser dispenses grain pellets that the guests can throw to the animals. Guests enjoy watching animals consume the pellets.

zoopedia_footstool.text: Children can stand on the footstool to get a better view of the animal exhibits. Children are happier when they can see the animals.

zoopedia_gazebo.text: Guests enjoy taking a break by sitting in the gazebo. This restful location can make guests happy to sit and watch the activity going on around them.

zoopedia_umbrellatable.text: A dining table allows guests to sit down to consume food and drink purchased at the zoo. Guests are happier when they don't have to eat standing up.

zoopedia_themedumbrellatable.text: A dining table allows guests to sit down to consume food and drink purchased at the zoo. Guests are happier when they don't have to eat standing up. Guests who have enjoyed an exhibit particularly enjoy it when the nearby scenery objects feature a similar theme.
